'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / brag ca dang / mig yor dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan

mor gyur la zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de lta yin gyis/ su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig /smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin

te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyid kyang byang chub la byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa ste stong pa'o/ /

stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med

kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo / /thos so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /

bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yul ma gad+ha'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cig blangs na rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni de bzhin gshegs pa

'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par blta'o/ /phyi na til gyi lhag ma lus pa ltar ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/

dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar brlags te/ rdul phra rab tsam du byas pa la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur

ro/ stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i tshad ni tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu brlags te/ thal bar byas pa de las

skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag ste/ skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul

phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas/ tshul de bzhin du bor te/ de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu re res tshul de

dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig

yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /

dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang gang dag tu phyin te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags

te rdul phra rab tu brlags na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa'am/ rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba

phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs

phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya bar shes pa'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpe de la ni sems can rnams myos par 'gyur gyi/ don

'tshal ba'am/ gzhal ba'am/ bgrang ba'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag

ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag

ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do/ /de

nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen

por bsregs kyang bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/

sems can mos pa chung ngu dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi skyed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten

gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu brlags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa

chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo dang /

bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so snyam du sems

sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud de ci nas kyang

mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to/ /nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la

yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams ni bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongs su yi 'chad pa med de/ nam mkha'i khams la skye ba 'am/

'jig pa 'am/ 'tshig pa 'am/ 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni skyo ba dang /

yongs su yi 'chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu gang la nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba de ni 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi 'chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba

med do/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang la 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do/ /de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de ni shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa dag gis

mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang gzhan la yang rgya

cher ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gis gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub

par bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i

sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher bstan pa dang /

gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab bo zhes sems bskyed pa des bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi

spyan sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang / rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom

pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/

'jug par byed dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sems skyed cing gom pa bdun 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i

char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig

phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bur 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par

zhugs so/ /de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por cig car du snang bar gyur pa ni smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kas+yi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams

pa de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung shig /smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung

shig /byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa

dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma sangs rgyas deng ni bdag cag

gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub

sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam

grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ le'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na
mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //
